TopicTitle: Why wont my crew show up

Articles.Content: When I use my new command pod from 1.4 the crew is not in the bottom right corner. Where are they?

Slight mix up with the Mk1-3 command pod, the IVA internal model wasn't included for some reason. (The crew are still there, you can EVA them by clicking the hatch. With no internal file, the game doesn't display their portraits.)

You can wait till 1.4.1 fixes it in a week or so, or you can use my mod that temporarily fixes it by using the old Mk1-2 internal.

Link is in my signature.

Edited March 9, 2018 by Rocket In My Pocket
